entities.name: fudge
entities.description: Fudge is a person who is questioning Mrs. Figg about her story. He has raised his eyebrows in surprise.

entities.name: mrs figg
entities.description: Mrs. Figg is the one telling the story to Fudge and Madam Bones. She seems nervous and fumbles with her words.

entities.name: madam bones
entities.description: Madam Bones is a person who is questioning Mrs. Figg about what she saw in the alleyway. She has a monocle and is very sharp-eyed.

entities.name: dementors
entities.description: Dementors are creatures that Mrs. Figg claims to have seen gliding down the alleyway. Madam Bones corrects her saying they don't run but glide.

relationships.description: Mrs. Figg is telling a story to Fudge and Madam Bones.
Madam Bones is questioning Mrs. Figg about what she saw in the alleyway.
Fudge is listening to Mrs. Figg's story and asking her questions.
